title: Continuous disconnecting from game on Mac
body: Hi there, I've been stuck for about a week now and can't seem to fix this issue. I can login into my acc and get to homescreen, shop etc. but when I get into login screen my game DCs. It pops up with "unexpected error" and then my internet goes haywire for a bit until league is closed. and then is fine again? any tips or helps out there?

replies.body:
That's gonna be one to submit to player support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

It's not an issue I'm at all familiar with, nor is it common, so support is going to be able to help you much better than we are.
